title: CHF 70 Million Series C: Scaling Delicious
excerpt: We've raised CHF 70 million to accelerate production and expand across Europe. The future of food is well-funded.
content: This investment round was led by Vorwerk Ventures and L Catterton, with participation from existing investors including Movendo Capital and ETH Foundation. The funding will accelerate the build-out of our Memmingen facility and support our expansion into new European markets. Our mission hasn't changed: make plant-based meat that's genuinely delicious. Now we have the resources to do it at scale.
author: Planted Team
